endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of available food items with basic details like name and category.
Retrieve detailed nutritional information about a specific food item by its unique identifier.
Log and recommend a daily nutritional intake plan based on user preferences and dietary goals.
Retrieve a list of all available food categories and their descriptions.
Retrieve nutritional guidelines and daily recommendations for a specific demographic category.
Submit custom recipes and retrieve their calculated nutritional data.
Retrieve a list of common allergens and food items containing them.
Update a user's dietary preferences and restrictions for personalized recommendations.
Delete a previously submitted custom recipe by its unique identifier.
Submit a complete meal plan for a detailed nutritional consistency check.
